017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
021import static java.lang.Long.compare;
022import static java.lang.String.format;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Base32.getEncoder;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.repeat;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.SystemUtils.getRandom;
027
028import java.time.Instant;
029import java.util.Objects;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Base32.Encoder;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.TSID;
036
037/**
038 *  The implementation for the interface
039 *  {@link TSID}.
040 *
041 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
042 *  @version $Id: TSIDImpl.java 1037 2022-12-15 00:35:17Z tquadrat $
043 *  @since 0.1.0
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 */
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TSIDImpl.java 1037 2022-12-15 00:35:17Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
049public final class TSIDImpl implements TSID
050{
051        /*---------------*\
052    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
053        \*---------------*/
054
055        /*-----------*\
056    ====** Constants **========================================================
057        \*-----------*/
058
059        /*------------*\
060    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
061        \*------------*/
062    /**
063     *  The internal representation of a TSID is a {@code long} value.
064     */
065    private final long m_Id;
066
067        /*------------------------*\
068    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
069        \*------------------------*/
070    /**
071     *  The beginning of the epoch for these ids.
072     */
073    public static final Instant BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT;
074
075    /**
076     *  The node number for the TSIDs.
077     */
078    public static final long TSID_Node;
079
080    /**
081     *  The shift to convert the current time into the time-base used by this
082     *  class.
083     */
084    public static final long SHIFT;
085
086    /**
087     *  The encoder for
088     *  {@link #toString()}.
089     */
090    private static final Encoder m_Encoder;
091
092    static
093    {
094        BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT = Instant.parse( BEGIN_OF_EPOCH );
095        SHIFT = BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT.toEpochMilli();
096
097        final var nodeId = Integer.getInteger( PROPERTY_TSID_NODE, getRandom().nextInt( MAX_NODES ) );
098        if( nodeId < MAX_NODES )
099        {
100            TSID_Node = (long) nodeId;
101        }
102        else
103        {
104            //noinspection LocalVariableNamingConvention
105            final var e = new ValidationException( "Node id '%d' is too large, value must be less than %d".formatted( nodeId, MAX_NODES ) );
106            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
107        }
108
109        m_Encoder = getEncoder();
110    }
111
112        /*--------------*\
113    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
114        \*--------------*/
115    /**
116     *  Creates a new instance of {@code TSIDImpl}.
117     *
118     *  @param  id  The internal representation of a TSID is a {@code long}
119     *      value.
120     */
121    public TSIDImpl( final long id )
122    {
123        m_Id = id;
124    }   //  TSIDImpl()
125
126        /*---------*\
127    ====** Methods **==========================================================
128        \*---------*/
129    /**
130     *  {@inheritDoc}
131     */
132    @Override
133    public final long asLong() { return m_Id; }
134
135    /**
136     *  {@inheritDoc}
137     */
138    @Override
139    public int compareTo( final TSID other )
140    {
141        final var retValue = signum( compare( m_Id, other.asLong() ) );
142
143        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
144        return retValue;
145    }   //  compareTo()
146
147    /**
148     *  {@inheritDoc}
149     */
150    @Override
151    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
152    {
153        var retValue = this == o;
154        if( !retValue && o instanceof final TSIDImpl other )
155        {
156            retValue = m_Id == other.m_Id;
157        }
158
159        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
160        return retValue;
161    }   //  equals()
162
163    /**
164     *  {@inheritDoc}
165     */
166    @Override
167    public final int hashCode() { return Objects.hash( m_Id ); }
168
169    /**
170     *   {@inheritDoc}
171     */
172    @Override
173    public final String toString()
174    {
175        final var base32 = m_Encoder.encodeToString( m_Id );
176        final var retValue = format( "X%s%s", repeat( "0", TSID_Size - 1 - base32.length() ), base32 );
177
178        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
179        return retValue;
180    }   //  toString()
181}
182//  class TSIDImpl
183
184/*
185 *  End of File
186 */
